info: Rating, 2 stars,  · 1 week ago,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: The location is great and Bashundara is an upscale neighborhood. The place and the workers though were a bit difficult. We were promised a soft bed but the bed was hard as of Bangladeshi standards. The workers promised to change the mattress but did never show up. There are many cockroaches, no hot water and AC's only in the bed rooms. There are only a few cutleries (only spoons), few plates and no water filter. The door of the house is closed by night and you have to wake the guards to come inside. Additionaly the guards asked several times for tips even though they were not that helpful. When we checked in, the room was not even finished cleaning or not even cleaned at all. Overall a difficult stay. For European standards it is quite challenging I would say.

rating_comment: Great Place I would say, the host is also communicative, I enjoyed the stay there.

rating_comment:
a great host. very communicative and understanding. it was easy to check in. there is always someone to help. quiet location. only thing is that you can't walk to groceries or any shop. but that's not the problem of this apartment. the area is built in such way. it's a residential area.
i will be happy to book again.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · March 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: My stay at this apartment was excellent. The host was incredibly accommodating and responsive to any questions or concerns I had. The apartment was clean, spacious, and well-furnished, providing a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The location was convenient. Overall, I highly recommend this Airbnb for anyone visiting Dhaka and looking for a pleasant and hassle-free experience.

Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Our stay at Mr. Tayab’s place was a wonderful experience. The host was very helpful and accomodating. We found the apartment very neat & clean and it matched with the photos and description.
We would highly recommend the host and this beautiful apartment.
Thanks, Mr. Tayab!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · August 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Mohammad’s listing was wonderful. At first, it was hard for us to find the house since we are new to the place. But checking in was flexible. There were people right outside the building who helped us in with our luggages. The house was beautiful and appropriate for family stay. And everything else was manageable!
I will definitely stay again when I’m back from New York!

Flat with two rooms
rooms, in one room bathroom is attached
both room have ac with it

in drawing room no AC

in walking distance of 400 Mtr u have small Cafe
sometimes u get Uber easily
the best part basundra is not crowded like banani or gulshan
good roads
but this is not central
u reach central this will take 30 Mins with traffic
